overview:
Greg is the President of CoverHound Insurance Solutions.

His industry experience includes production and management roles at State Farm, Countrywide Insurance Services/Balboa Insurance Group, 21st Century Insurance and Liberty Company Insurance Brokers.

In 2003 Greg partnered in National Insurance Solutions Inc (NIS), a startup independent agency where he joined as Chief Operations Office, Principal. Greg managed the day-to-day operational and business support activities of the organization. He also directed the company’s marketing efforts, earning recognition in the Insurance Trade Magazine “Rough Notes.” During Greg’s tenure at NIS from 2003 - 2011 he led the business from nascent startup to stability and profitability. While at NIS Greg noticed a shift in the buying habits and demands of consumers. This trend eventually led Greg to join CoverHound with the goal of meeting the evolving demands of the insurance consumer.

Greg lives in his hometown of Simi Valley, California with his wife and their young daughter. He enjoys outdoor activities including camping, surfing, swimming and mountain biking.
